skills.name: WAR MACHINE
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• 45% Chance to inflict Bleed for 2 turns.
• Bleed deals true damage over time with a chance to Heal Block every turn.

skills.name: ENTRENCH
desc: • Increases ATK and Endure status for self and up to 2 additional allies.

skills.name: REPEAL
desc: Grants Immunity to all allies for 1 turn at the start of the battle. Grants immunity to a random ally every following turn.
